title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2052.10 - Reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2052.10 - Reporting

State Regulations

The president or his designee shall submit to the board of
directors annually a report reflecting the status of all existing personal
service contracts, and identifying any new personal service contracts entered
into during the preceding year and the manner in which outside contractors for
those new contracts were selected. In addition, the board of directors shall
annually review and approve a report on personal service contracts which shall
include a copy of this Part and an explanation thereof and of any amendments
thereto since the last annual report, a list of outside contractors performing
services since the last annual report, and a list of fees, commissions or other
charges paid to outside contractors during the year. Such annual report shall
be submitted to the Division of the Budget, the Department of Audit and

Control, the Senate Finance Committee and the Assembly Ways and Means Committee
and shall be made available to the public on reasonable
request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

2052.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
